newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Suburban Ostomy started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Suburban Ostomy started.

text.p: -- Bear Stearns said on Monday it had started coverage of Suburban Ostomy Supply Co Inc with a rating of attractive.
-- "They are a way to play the growth in home health care," said analyst A.J. Rice.
-- He estimated earnings at the wholesaler of medical supplies would increase 25 to 30 percent a year through fiscal 1998.
-- Earnings per share are seen at $0.37 in fiscal 1996, $0.46 in fiscal 1997 and $0.61 in fiscal 1998.
- "They've been around and have a long-term track record," he said.
